name: Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX: Maximum Remix
overview: This game was released by Acclaim Entertainment and developed by Z-Axis in 2001. It was released as an update to the 2000 Playstation game Dave Mirra Freestyle BMX. This edition comes with more riders, more music, modes, and levels. The level count is increased from 12 to 20. A new difficulty mode was added called Expert Mode, which makes the game much tougher and implements the most advanced tricks in the game. Another perk of the new version is a soundtrack disc of all the new songs on the soundtrack.
